reuters.title: FRANCE FUND INC <FRN> SETS INITIAL DIVIDEND
reuters.body: France Fund Inc said its board declared an initial dividend of 1.12 dlrs per share, payable April six, to holders of record March 20. The fund said the dividend represents two cts per share for net investment income realized during 1986 and 1.10 dlrs from net taxable gains realized during the year. Reuter 
